body:
Yeah that build is "passing" but is actually failing all over the place.

EDIT: Actually nevermind, our [master builds are failing too](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/issues/480). The functional test build seems to be working fine, I'm testing if it can successfully detect a failure.
